text: Hey <@U0K8ZSHN0> and <@U02F8LF2X> I understand this necessitate  a larger conversation....but...if pmmc were smaller in scale: houses in central office. Focused on incubating five various stage start ups and focused primarily on the 'business side of things' I'm wondering what some high value items that can fit like tabletop or table side for prototyping or iterating on prototypes would be. Like a scaled down version of our lab. What are things we would definitely want?  3D printers. Certain software suites. What comes to mind?

So certainly things that fit on the desktop. So an electronics bench (soldering station, electronic test equipment, microscope , basically our lab right now). Two types of 3D printers, laser cutter like a glow forge (if it's ever released).
Beyond that, some autodesk software like fusion 360 and eagle.
That's just off top of my head. Need to think more
This is great. Let's keep riffing
